summary: From a bland tract house on the outskirts of Los Angeles, Simon Geist (with occasional help from his platonic girlfriend Darla) wages war against all of modern American popular culture. ... See full summary Â»
cast: Dan Zukovic|Susan Heimbeinder|Mark Ruffalo|Pamela Dickerson|Andrew Falk|Sibel Ergener|James Lorinz|Yul Vazquez|Thomas Prisco|Louis Mustillo|Steven Kay|Blaine Capatch|Mitch Mayer|Will Huston|Yevo|Carl Lamb|Maria von Hartz|Ron Zwang|Mitch Seyfer|Rick Askew|Edward Perotti
title: The Last Big Thing
